english.segment1: Pour me out. Til there's nothing left of me. Pour me out
english.segment2: Pour me out. So that someday I might see. Pour me out
english.segment3: I want to lose myself. In finding You. Embracing grace and facing truth. Tear down these walls that dim. The shape I'm in
english.segment4: Pour me out. From my river to Your sea. Pour me out
english.segment5: Pour me out. Let me ride on waves of peace. Pour me out
english.segment6: I want to understand. This greater plan. How character can shape a man. Your image surrounding me. Pray that will be
